check_valid_X
=============

.. py:module:: check_valid_X


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   check_valid_X.check_valid_X


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: check_valid_X(X, order)

   Ensure X is a non-empty Pandas data frame or Numpy array, and raise errors according to conditions of failed check

   :param X (Any):
   :type X (Any): The input value to process
   :param Raises:
   :param TypeError:
   :type TypeError: If X is of an unsupported type
   :param ValueError:
   :type ValueError: If X is an empty Pandas data frame or Numpy array
   :param Returns:
   :param None:

   .. rubric:: Examples

   >>> check_valid_X([], 'first')
